new_components_needed.name: teamGrid
new_components_needed.purpose: Display team member profiles with photos, roles, descriptions, and social links
new_components_needed.layout: Grid layout with cards for each team member
new_components_needed.notes: Shows 4 team members: Noel Bossart, Tobias Morf, Michael Karrer, Anabel Hafstad with photos, roles, bios and LinkedIn links

new_components_needed.name: socialResponsibility
new_components_needed.purpose: Showcase company's social responsibility initiatives and values
new_components_needed.layout: Full-width section with large image and text content
new_components_needed.notes: Describes social engagement in Brazil (familyboss.art project)

new_components_needed.name: bentoGrid
new_components_needed.purpose: Multi-column feature grid with icons, titles, descriptions - modern bento-box style layout
new_components_needed.layout: Asymmetric grid with varying card sizes
new_components_needed.notes: Different from featuresList - has icons, varied sizing, and more visual hierarchy. Includes Material Icons (web_traffic, ads_click, mobile_layout, phone, add_shopping_cart, 3p, data_loss_prevention)

new_components_needed.name: statsBanner
new_components_needed.layout: Horizontal or grid layout of large numbers with labels
used_in: Multiple pages showing '4.9 stars on Google', '25 years experience'
new_components_needed.notes: Used for trust signals and social proof

new_components_needed.name: imageTextAlternating
new_components_needed.purpose: Alternating image-text sections for process steps or features
new_components_needed.layout: Sections alternate between image-left and image-right
used_in: de_webdesign-agentur.md (lines 211-257 - 4 steps: Botschaft, Bedienung, Design, Service)
new_components_needed.notes: Different from process section - has full images, more detailed descriptions, alternating layout

new_components_needed.name: iconGrid
new_components_needed.purpose: Simple grid of icons with short labels (checkmarks, features)
new_components_needed.notes: Simpler version of featuresList, just icon + short text

new_components_needed.name: ratingDisplay
new_components_needed.layout: Inline or card display of rating information
new_components_needed.notes: Shows '4.9 Sterne Bewertungen auf Google' - trust signal

new_components_needed.name: certificationBadge
used_in: Squarespace Gold Partner badge throughout site
new_components_needed.notes: Used for Gold Partner badge, can be inline with content or standalone

new_components_needed.name: timelineProcess
new_components_needed.purpose: Numbered timeline showing process steps with detailed descriptions
new_components_needed.notes: Different from process section - more detailed, numbered explicitly

new_components_needed.name: contentShowcase
new_components_needed.purpose: Showcase content with large background image and overlay text
new_components_needed.notes: Similar to hero but for mid-page content highlights

notes: The original site uses a mix of standard and custom content blocks
Team member display is critical and appears on multiple pages
Bento grid is a key differentiator and used extensively
Process/timeline sections appear in multiple variations
Social responsibility section is unique to company values
Rating displays are used as trust signals throughout
